title: Geri edits films.
subTitle: An award winning film editor steered by a shrewd intuitive touch and perfectionism.
seoDescription: An award winning film editor steered by a shrewd intuitive touch and perfectionism.

Geri [she/her]

Having worked across both commercial and independent film spaces - narrative shorts, documentaries, music videos and fashion films has made her perceptive in the field. Beyond the cutting room floor, Geri channels innate sensitivity and warmth throughout her work. She aims to empower both the narratives and characters she takes on through pace, rhythm and timing of her editing.

Geri’s work has been screened and revelled at Melbourne International Film Festival, Melbourne Queer Film Festival, Women’s Film Festival, Mardi Gras Film Festival, St Kilda Film Festival & the Atom Awards. While her client list boasts the likes of Nike, JD Sports, Kathmandu, Crumpler, Mecca, Mazda, Mercedes Benz, Campari, Bird in Hand & Melbourne Fashion Week alongside notable music acts Troye Sivan, G-Flip, Mallrat, Lisa Mitchell, Gretta Ray & Alice-Ivy.
